tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manga   All-Girls School   Assassins   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Cousins   Death   Fantasy World   Half-human Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hidden Abilities   Loli   Male Protagonist   Master-Disciple Relationship   Nobles   Pragmatic Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Schemes And Conspiracies   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Teachers   Vampires

description: As an aristocrat, Melida Angel studied at an academy that developed mana users but she did not have any mana. Kufa Vampir was dispatched to be her tutor and at the same time he was ordered to assassinate the girl if she did not have any talent. “Do you want to try to entrust your life to me?” he asked, as not an assassin nor a tutor but as someone that was betting on his pride as an assassin tutor, to show the girl’s worth to the world.>
